website_summaries.verdict: Available in 5 different size options for different ages of children and adults.
pros: One of available sizes matches official NCAA college football size
Good for training those hoping to play beyond high school
Composite cover yields a great grip
Multiple size options for different ages
cons: Some models don't hold air after wear
Dye may rub off when wet

customer_reviews.title: This gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: The neighbor kids kept utilizing my big front lawn for their friendly scrimmages with a nerf football and after I decided it was time to show those punks what the real world was like I ordered this ball. Let me tell you, there was nothing like the feel of this Wilson NCAA Composite football under my arm as I trucked 12 year old kids and relived my freshman year C team glory days. Although the kids haven’t come back to play in my yard due to various injuries, I know lead the neighborhood in touch football stats for the season. Can’t wait to bust this out at the neighborhood picnic this week!
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great Football - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding the correct football for my 11-year old Grandson. I spoke to customer service at Wilson Sporting goods and asked them which iteration of their football design would perform best for my Grandson. Customer Service directed my attention to the Youth Composite Football. My Grandson opened his presents today and found the football. We went outdoors and through the ball around for a while. Two thing I noticed immediately was the ball was easy to grip because of the finish of the ball. The second thing I noticed is that the football easily fit into my Grandson's hand. This is a great youth football with from a great company
customer_reviews.author: BigFoot14

customer_reviews.title: Wilson. The friend you play catch with.
customer_reviews.text: This TDY youth football is without question the best composite ball I’ve found and my 8- yr old loves. Spontaneously ran outside to start playing with it. This, after just gotten an UA youth composite. The Nike Vapor? Please. Extra tall laces and an unnatural look. Only this Wilson will do. For any purest out there, UA and Nike are laughable. I drank the kool-aid but once I got this ball in my hands, we were too busy running routes to laugh anymore.
customer_reviews.author: yodermaker

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this football. Seems to be higher quality than those cheap footballs and hopefully will hold up for a long time. Our dog got ahold of the previous football and within short order the seams were toast and the old football needed to be replaced. So far this one is holding up much better.
customer_reviews.author: Brent T Henning

customer_reviews.title: Solid Ball, Good grip and nice laces
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ball, especially for the price you can't beat it. Official size is pretty large for a female with smaller hands. Good grip and shape. Throws nicely. Seems well built and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice peewee football
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's a football! Perfect size for my 7 year old son. We got the peewee size which is the size they use for his flag football team. Seems like really good quality and my son can throw some tight spirals with it.
customer_reviews.author: BillyDoc

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The ball is not bad. Gets 3 out of 5 because when I received it, some of the stitching was coming out. You can see a slight bulge where the threads are weak. To expensive to ship back from Hawaii, so I kept it. Wish the ball came in better condition. Otherwise it throws and spirals good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to have autographed for a charity event. Very nice looking balls.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a cheaper version than advertised, don’t waste your money! Doesn’t hold air.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking I would receive something similar to what was pictured...instead I got a “red zone” version, which retails for $9.97 at Walmart. What I got is the bronze version, not what is pictured. Don’t waste your money. It will hold air for a few hours, but after a day or two will be uselessly flat. So don’t think you can pump it up and use it for the weekend, better bring a pump! Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was VERY disappointed and feel this image is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and purchased these as student gifts for the winter holiday. I allowed the 2 students to select the ball themselves and they wanted this ball because of the double white lines. When they arrived they were not the ball pictured but instead a solid brown ball. I was VERY disappointed and feel this image is deceptive. I was embarrassed to give them a ball that they did not choose but had no alternative as there was no time to purchase a replacement and return these.
customer_reviews.author: La Nortena

customer_reviews.title: Fun for football practice
customer_reviews.text: Fun little football set! Bought it for my son who is just starting flag football and wanted to practice at home. After a few months of use, the flags are holding up well. They clip on and pull off safely (very similar to the flags they use in his games). The football is small and a good size for him (he is 5). The flags are definitely made for children- I'm a 5'2 woman and I can just get them to fit around my waist, but for my husband, no way!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Washington

customer_reviews.title: Scuff
customer_reviews.text: Had a scuff. I know, its a football it will get roughed up as it is used. However, i purchased as a prop for a photo shoot and was disappointed it arrived with a blemish.
customer_reviews.author: Sherin L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality football; bad stripes
customer_reviews.text: I got this football so my girlfriend and I could play catch. It feels great in your hand and it's easy to throw and catch. The only complaint I have is that the white stripes started fading pretty bad after the first time we played catch.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Kiriokos

customer_reviews.title: Flawed from this seller
customer_reviews.text: The valve to this ball had an issue. Warrantied it flawlessly through the manufacturer who sells it for the exact same price.
customer_reviews.author: The Road Runner

customer_reviews.title: White Stripes Peel Off
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty nice ball with good grip. Would have been 5 stars but the white striped started peeling/rubbing off. I did, however, use this ball on turf (fake grass), so maybe that wore it down faster. Either way, I have only gone out and thrown the ball 5 or so times so I feel like it shouldn't have worn down this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: I’m 65 and I’ve never seen a poorer made football at any price.
customer_reviews.text: This ball came pumped up just like it should. However, my 7 year old grandson kicked it off the tee one time. When we retrieved it, it was half flat. Now he’s got a pretty good leg, but it’s not that good. Save time and buy the leather one. Wilson, wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Bad valve.
customer_reviews.text: Inflating valve malfunctioned. I went to inflate this ball with a properly wetted needle and the valve pushed entirely into the bell. It made the ball totally unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Valve leaked the first time it was inflated.
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great, if it didn't leak. The first time I inflated it, it wouldn't hold air. You could hear air slowly hissing out of the valve. Since I bought this before going over seas on assignment I made due by plugging the valve after inflating it. But we will see how long that lasts. If I had tested it before bringing it to Vietnam, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for the price. Youth football size and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn C.

customer_reviews.title: Are you ready for some football!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this football for a long time and it's held up superbly! From throwing it around on the beach, to playing in the streets and landing on concrete, this football takes a licking. Stitching is still intact after so much wear and tear. I really didn't think this ball would hold up as well as it has but, I'm glad it is!
customer_reviews.author: C Ro

customer_reviews.title: NCAA Football
customer_reviews.text: This is the same size that’s used in high school football. Perfect for practice and play!
customer_reviews.author: SC Perks

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with no issues. It’s a great ball. It’s held up well and it holds air very well. I haven’t had to add a bit of air so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Was good until it needed air
customer_reviews.text: The football was fine until it eventually needed air. The first time I went to pump it up the whole rubber valve just collapsed into the ball and bent & broke the needle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “Great Product”
customer_reviews.text: My son & I love it. Durability with quality. A defenite 👍🏼 Up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lenarz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this ball again. After about 5-6 mos and relatively little use, it no longer holds air and deflates very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya K Solberg

customer_reviews.title: Great football
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these footballs to practice kicking. They have great flight. I used in rain and snow and they held up great. They are slowly getting worn down a bit but considering I am constantly kicking them it’s to be expected
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kane

customer_reviews.title: Official Size Football like the Pros use
customer_reviews.text: This is an official size football - same size as the NFL. I got this on a special deal, a great deal actually! On a great football. This not made of leather.
customer_reviews.author: Sham

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk.  Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of absolute junk. The first time I tried to inflate it for using it this season it sprung a leak from the valve.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B Caskey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for causal playing
customer_reviews.text: The ball is well made for street use. It is well balanced. This ball is fun to play with Wilson makes a quality product. Great of some catch
customer_reviews.author: David1301

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: As good as you can get for the price. I used this in a flag football league playing quarterback and the grip is fantastic. Unfortunately it loses that grip fairly quickly but it is still decent ball. I will buy this again for next season!
customer_reviews.author: ScottyC

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came in great time and just the right size to use for prospective college students!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for boys 7-12
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a football used daily by the boys. This one is perfect. Great size, quality and a natural grip.
customer_reviews.author: Yeliz Katmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Football
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong. It feels great and looks great. Only problem I have with it is that its big, but I mean I bought an official size football, so I can't complain. But It wouldn't be the size I would go for if you are getting it for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it play with it almost daily. Only thing is it rips vary easily
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good youth football
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 10 year old son. Good grip. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: D Buck

customer_reviews.title: Good materials for construction
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Good materials for construction. I think it should last a long time. Official NCAA size.
customer_reviews.author: norahs

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured or described.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the composite football pictured in the Amazon listing. I received the black and orange rubber one pictured here in my review.
customer_reviews.author: KDC

customer_reviews.title: a great football, but did have an issue with air ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a great football, but did have an issue with air valve. It recessed back into the football. I haven't had this issue before, so I don't know if it's just the one I received or not. Prob would roll the dice again.
customer_reviews.author: Bgor

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect for throwing around the backyard
customer_reviews.text: Football arrived broken with a leaky valve. When it is inflated, it is perfect for throwing around the backyard. I prefer the rubber of this ball to leather as it is lower maintenance for a ball that just gets thrown around occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Football football football
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Buy this and throw it as you watch the Texas Longhorns. Hook em. Yee haw
customer_reviews.author: Flavius Stilicho

customer_reviews.title: Also got Fruit Snacks
customer_reviews.text: The box I received had a brand new football and 3 bags of fruits snacks. This is the best trade deal of all trade deals
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Company
customer_reviews.text: Amazing company also sent bonus extras!! Made my son really happy. Thanks again, will be a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Follweiler

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we had this football only one week and the entire seam failed and leaked air. It’s no longer usable. Boo. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Tere L. Searing

customer_reviews.title: Missing pump and tee
customer_reviews.text: The football is great. We have had a lot of fun and the ball seems very durable, as we have been throwing on pavement. My main complaint is that the description said that the ball comes with a pump and tee, but they were nowhere to be found. I didn't know want to go through the Amazon return process to get a cheap tee and pump.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Yates

customer_reviews.title: Please stay cheap
customer_reviews.text: I've bought about 4 of this exact ball now. It's just the best ball to toss around: it's not expensive, it's solid, and it's got a ton of grip.
customer_reviews.author: IntenseLemon

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on the football was superb. I have expected it to be messed up for the price. The tap hasnt come off yet and keep air really well.
customer_reviews.author: Detroit Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice football
customer_reviews.text: A perfect league and practice ball. It has a sticky grip most of the time except when on long wet grass. Excellent buy at $10. Popular with the other kids.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 5 year old and nice grip/feel on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Branscome

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. great feel from this football. it is as advertised. Note: it goes on sale once in a while. get it then. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. Noga

customer_reviews.title: Great grip!!
customer_reviews.text: This ball has great grip to it. Ordered the official size (size works good HS practice ball) Very impressed with this compisite ball.
customer_reviews.author: Aceduce

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: The ball deflated within minutes of inflation, I saw one review saying this and thought maybe it was a mess up but definitely wouldn’t buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball.  Perfect weight and tackiness.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball. Perfect weight and tackiness. Love the laces.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good deal but after two weeks the ball started leaking air and would hold air.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT SCHULDT

customer_reviews.title: Great value, performance!!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball at a great price! Opted to pay a little more for this one and glad I did. We've had it for a few weeks of steady use and it is holding up well. I think it feels better after it's used a bit. Even spent time in the pool over holiday weekend and no worse for wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Casado

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this ball has nice grip and is well made. Received it quickly with prime shipping. Ball was a little flat so you may need to purchase a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: How much you wanna bet I can throw this football over them mountains?
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My dad gave it to me for Christmas and it is a great ball. It’s a very good gift and I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Candace 76

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first.. then they left me sad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these football.. one of them works perfect.. one goes flat after a day of use.. the last one somehow had the air pump valve go inside the rubber of the football so I can't pump that one up. I really like these footballs but they wear out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: will derrickson

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This football is a joke. I understand it’s a kids ball but the laces are crooked, the ends of the ball are jacked up and the stitching is already coming out. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Fredericksen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a bit more pointier than the Wilson NFL MVP Football by Wilson  but both are good
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome football. Not real leather but still very durable. Used a lot and still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better than a liter of cola
customer_reviews.text: It's a football. It's a good football. You can throw it. You can catch it, unless you're paid money to wear an Atlanta Falcon's uniform.
customer_reviews.author: bmac

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get scuffs easily and seams don’t line up good for backyard practice
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: ... for a child from ages 11-14 and has a great grip. the ball and grip stays good over ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is the right size and weight for a child from ages 11-14 and has a great grip. the ball and grip stays good over time and is excellent for all things. Don't throw it in the water though because it will get waterlogged.
customer_reviews.author: burt

customer_reviews.title: There is only one football, Wilson !
customer_reviews.text: Best football money can buy! This is the full size collegiate ball not the ones kids play with at PeeWee football. (I made that mistake already)
customer_reviews.author: Idealist

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. It got a rip within 24 hours of us opening the package.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality always
customer_reviews.text: Thought would be larger but grandson is Youth football player 7-8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: jerry g.

customer_reviews.title: This football is great! Really good quality for the price and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This football is great! Really good quality for the price and easy to grip. I have pretty small hand and I can easily throw a spiral with this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller hands.
customer_reviews.text: My son literally doesn't leave home without this football. It stays clean, easy to grip, and perfect size. It's exactly the one he wanted. He drops his backpack, grabs his ball, and is out the door to find the neighborhood boys.
customer_reviews.author: LLA

customer_reviews.title: nice grip and comes all the way inflated and ready ...
customer_reviews.text: nice grip and comes all the way inflated and ready to play, good for a backyard​, turkey bowl or beach game, probably fine for a kids flag football league too. not sure why it says NCAA all over it and the packaging makes it look like this is a real NCAA ball , you couldn't even use this in a high school game, but those balls cost between 50-150 based on the school and are made of real leather.
customer_reviews.author: Flagstafflawyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value in one
customer_reviews.text: The best value football for a good game with friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Like

customer_reviews.title: After several used deflated while sitting in my sports closet ...
customer_reviews.text: After several used deflated while sitting in my sports closet. I have to pump it up often. It doesn't hold air well. If you play a game with it being a pump
customer_reviews.author: PS3 Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: I like this ball. Nice and grippy. It came inflated, and doesn't include inflating needle.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yoshida

customer_reviews.title: good ball
customer_reviews.text: got this for Christmas present for my nephew, he didnt expect to get this type of present. So far the ball is good and hasnt really heard any bad thing about it from him.
customer_reviews.author: Franky Juwana

customer_reviews.title: Great football
customer_reviews.text: My boys were excited to get this! It is a favorite of theirs now
customer_reviews.author: The ranch

customer_reviews.title: Very good experience
customer_reviews.text: It was nicely Packaged, came on time and was exactly as described. I am happy with my purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kara B

customer_reviews.title: Nice X-mas gift for kids in need
customer_reviews.text: It is great that it had a little hand pump. A pump needle would have been nice. Standard football made by Wilson, packaged well and made a great gift for some little boy in need.
customer_reviews.author: cordellia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and well made
customer_reviews.text: Football is exactly as expected. Great quality and well made.
customer_reviews.author: IAreviewerAnk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Teaching wife how to throw a football. I also take it to tailgate.
customer_reviews.author: edward ruffin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!
customer_reviews.text: MY BOYS LOVE THESE! 2 YEAR OLD & 12 YEAR OLD APPROVED :)
customer_reviews.author: Crys Gee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: As a new Head Coach having to purchase so much new equipment to be successful, it's Just what I expected and more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great quality football
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great quality football. Price is great considering the same type of ball is around 60 dollars at Dick's. I would recommend this ball for an older age group, it being a bigger ball than most. Good grip, laces aren't oversized, but are noticeable when throwing. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good balls, I got 4 for my 3rd-5th grade flag football team and we love them, grippy
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A real nice football and great grip. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman54

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for the price. High quality with good feel on the laces. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob E. Sammer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves these. Bought half a dozen for kicking practice. Not a bad buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling ball. Not a cheap rubber ball. Great leather feel and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Colin C Rock

customer_reviews.title: Ideal football
customer_reviews.text: Takes a games of catch to break in, but I have no complaints about this ball. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Holdener

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Good ball with a good grip... Make sure you get the free shipiing with it to make it worth the wait. Otherwise get it at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Yee-haw
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Throws great, and the pump and tee are awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. O'connell

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, really like the feel
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan. Haven't used it too long, but I felt like it was a great price and the ball is really nice, good feel and weight. Most of my buddies so far prefer it over the NCAA Nike one, the laces on that one are kinda odd to me (they're really high and sort of slip apart. The laces on this Wilson ball are lower and tighter). I'm interested in how well it wears, the surface of my last football was way too slick after not long.
customer_reviews.author: snocyclist

customer_reviews.title: Defected football
customer_reviews.text: My grandson went to pump one of the footballs up and where the plug shouldn’t be just a whole
customer_reviews.author: P. Gayle Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Not lookin good😕
customer_reviews.text: My package came with a broken pump hole and it was also popped, don’t recommend. And please fix this amazon. Thank u
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: It was just the right size for them and they loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my pre-teen grandsons. It was just the right size for them and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The laces are not right and the ball stop holding air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice football for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice football for the price. Have a youth football team of 7 and 8 yr older and they love it....
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome football, son (and friends) love it. Same one his middle school team uses.
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves his new football. The guys at work do too! We throw it around at lunch. Great
customer_reviews.author: Tony Steffensen

customer_reviews.title: such fun
customer_reviews.text: Spray painted it gold for my wedding and used it for garter toss, such fun memories
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rivas

customer_reviews.title: This football was a lot of fun for about a week of casual play until an ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This football was a lot of fun for about a week of casual play until an attempt to inflate it gently with a moistened pump needle popped it. The inflation hole collapsed inside and the ball started leaking air. I do not recommend this football.
customer_reviews.author: James Borden
